message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the encoding and streaming of 360{\deg} video, which involves multimedia processing and delivery. Therefore, cs.MM (Multimedia) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves computer vision techniques for categorizing the video based on its features, which suggests cs.CV (Computer Vision) as another likely sub-category. The paper also deals with the practical constraints of encoding ladders, which suggests cs.GR (Graphics) as a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves optimization algorithms for forming the encoding ladder, which suggests cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as possible sub-categories.
